mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (ORDER_ID, ITEM_ID, MEMBER_ID, QUANTITY, STATE, REG_DATE) SELECT #{order_id}, #{item_id}, #{member_id}, #{quantity}, #{state}+1, sysdate FROM ORDERS ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC # WHERE ORDER_ID = {order_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ORDER_ID, ITEM_ID, MEMBER_ID, QUANTITY, STATE, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM ORDERS) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
